winltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtOur Core ValuesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtKeep it realltstronggt We do amazing work but were humble transparent and accountable If we make businesses easily run backoffice operationsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtAs a development DBA for Webgility you willltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligtDesign stable reliable and companiesltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequired Job Skills and Experienceltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltulgtltligt4 years work experience as a Database developer building commercial understanding of data management eg permissions recovery security and monitoringltligtltligtExtensive experience working with agile sprint teams to collaborateltligtltligtExcellent analytical and
